column5:
Today in the morning i went on my suicide journey without having drinking any thing the last 20 hours .. i sent a letter for my brothers about my plan. I turned my phone off and drove in the wildness, walked on hills ..
in the evening my head pain reached a maximum . I searched a cliff to end the pain faster than starving. It took me hours to decide. I was afraid for the first time in my life. As I reject fear always. The hurt my kids and family would face would be huge. But to retrieve the decision and fail again was also hard decision.
At the end I sent my location to my brothers and here I am back to life. I ll reach out a psychological treatment asap. 
When you mentally broken it can not be the right decision. I noticed that I wanted to kill certain things in my life, but not myself. In addition new things need to get birth. This exchange need  hard work and assistant. I hope every suicidal can afford them.

15, 11, 8, 3 years old. I'll leave after having medical treatment.. check my reply 
Thank for stopping by.
They seems to be sick. Don't make them a reference and don't let them ruin your life.
She is very pissed of me. I tried to make reconciliation but she refused.

I ve get 2 advices; the egg bill and treatment. 
Any other advices?
It's really hard not to be able to give what you don't have. I don't want to see my wife suffers of me. And I cant pay attention or care about her for many reasons. My mind is locked in other worlds. No attraction to her.
